Text.Page:
The kobolds are sneaking around to flank us from behind. The fools act like we can't see them skulking out there.

Kobolds are a pain in the ass but we need to keep them at bay as long as possible. Think you can cut a swath through them? If they fear us, they're not going to be so anxious to swarm our position.

Kill as many {@LinkCreature:7#9#Red Fang kobold minions} as you can. I doubt you'll run out.
That should make them think twice, or thrice. Thanks, <PCNAME>. Perhaps we can get five minutes of sleep now.
